participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, Emily loves to engage in fun activities with family and friends. She has a nurturing side, especially towards her pets.
participant_1.background: I put on my favorite pair of jeans made from recycled plastic bottles. I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews. I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews. I wait tables. I own two boxer dogs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and humorous, Jake has a lively spirit that draws people in. He is passionate about his work and enjoys spending quality time with his dog.
participant_2.background: I'm a pretty short guy, but I make up for it with my big personality. I love the freedom of being my own boss. I enjoy Budweiser beer. I'm a meataholic with a furry best friend as my ring bearer. My favorite TV shows are the ones I can watch with my dog.

content.text: Hello there!
Hey! How are you?
Good! What are you up to today?
I'm getting ready to go to the park with my dog.
Oh fun! I love going to the park.
I know! It's so nice outside today.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a boxer. She's a sweetheart.
Boxers are great dogs! I love their energy.
They sure are! She's the best.
I'm glad you like her. I have two boxer dogs of my own.
Oh wow! That must be a handful.
It can be, but it's also a lot of fun.
I can imagine.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a self-employed artist.
Oh that's cool! What kind of art do you do?
I do a lot of different things, but mostly painting and drawing.
That's great! I love to paint and draw too.
Really? That's awesome! We should hang out sometime and do art together.
That would be great! I'd love that.
Awesome! I'll send you my number.
